vouchers.name: Monetary Voucher
vouchers.description:
Monetary gift vouchers are always a welcome treat as they can be exchanged or used in part payment for anything from cocktails in our award-winning Cocktail Bar, afternoon tea, spa treatments or overnight stays!

Our monetary e-vouchers have no expiry date. However please note after 7 years from date of purchase, due to financial handling procedures, all gift card information will be expunged, and the voucher will be invalidated.

vouchers.name: Cheeseboard and Port Tasting Flight for Two
vouchers.description:
Share a delicious cheeseboard for two in our stunning, newly-refurbished Cocktail Bar. Each guest will enjoy a tasting flight of three ports from the prestigious Kopke Porto, the world's oldest port house. Our Port Tasting  Flight features a white port, an LBV and a 10-year-old tawny. 

This Gift Voucher can be redeemed on Monday to Sunday, before 9.00pm. This gift card cannot be used during the month of December. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

vouchers.name: Charcuterie Board and Bushmills Blends Whiskey Tasting Flight for Two
vouchers.description:
Share a delicious charcuterie board for two in our stunning, newly-refurbished Cocktail Bar. Each guest will enjoy a Bushmills Blends whiskey tasting flight featuring Bushmills Original, Bushmills Red Bush and Bushmills Black Bush.

 

This Gift Voucher can be redeemed on Monday to Sunday, before 9.00pm. This gift card cannot be used during the month of December. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

vouchers.name: Charcuterie Board and Bushmills Malts Whiskey Tasting Flight for Two
vouchers.description:
Share a delicious charcuterie board for two in our stunning, newly-refurbished Cocktail Bar. Each guest will enjoy a Bushmills Malts whiskey tasting flight featuring Bushmills 10-Year-Old Malt, Bushmills 16-Year-Old Malt and Bushmills 21-Year-Old-Malt.

Terms and conditions: This Gift Voucher can be redeemed on Monday to Sunday, before 9.00pm. This gift card cannot be used during the month of December. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

vouchers.name: Perfect Midweek Package for 2 (Dine in Berts Jazz Bar)
vouchers.description:
Enjoy a luxurious stay at The Merchant Hotel with dinner in Berts Jazz Bar and breakfast the following morning in The Great Room Restaurant. Begin your relaxation in our roof top hot tub which boasts uninterrupted views of the city. Continue your journey in the evening with a delectable meal in Bert’s Jazz Bar where you can unwind to live jazz and the city’s finest cocktails.

Following a blissful night’s sleep, enjoy breakfast The Great Room and take advantage of our complimentary digital newspapers, movies & Wi-Fi during your stay with a leisurely checkout at noon.

This package is available from Sunday to Thursday.

T&Cs: Must be booked three weeks prior to arrival date and must be booked directly at the hotel by calling (028) 90 234 888. Based on two persons sharing. Must present voucher on arrival. No cancellations once booking is made. Voucher cannot be used for a stay throughout December. Flexible booking - includes one date change with 7 days’ notice. This package includes a stay in either a Deluxe Victorian or Deluxe Art Deco room. This voucher cannot be exchanged for cash. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

vouchers.name: The Merchant Overnight Dining Experience for Two
vouchers.description:
Leave your stresses behind and treat yourself to a luxurious stay at The Merchant Hotel. Whether you're in need of a midweek treat or a weekend celebration, this voucher is valid for use on Monday to Saturday nights.

Enjoy an exquisite three-course meal in the grandeur of The Great Room Restaurant, followed by a relaxing night in one of our highly appointed deluxe rooms - the perfect space in which to escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life.

Awake refreshed to enjoy a delicious breakfast of your choice in The Great Room Restaurant.

Your stay also includes complimentary use of the gymnasium including our roof top sauna and steam room, as well as a leisurely checkout at 1pm.

T&C: Available Monday - Saturday. Must be booked three weeks prior to arrival date and must be booked directly at the hotel by calling (028) 90 234 888. Based on two persons sharing. Must present voucher on arrival. No cancellations booking is made. Flexible booking - includes one date change with 7 days’ notice. Guest may choose Victorian or Art Deco Deluxe Room, subject to availability. This voucher cannot be exchanged for cash. Dinner in The Great Room Restaurant includes 3 courses from the a la carte menu, and any additional items not included in the voucher must be paid for at the time.

Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

vouchers.name: Tasting Menu for two with wine pairings in The Great Room
vouchers.description:
A quintessential fine dining experience awaits guests visiting The Great Room Restaurant in the form of our delectable Tasting Menu paired with 5 specially selected wines. The grandeur of the perfectly preserved original Victorian architecture provides a stunning backdrop for the divine food created in The Great Room kitchens by Head Chef Johnny Leake.  

Terms and conditions: Please note, this e-voucher cannot be redeemed throughout the month of December. Menu changes seasonally. Available Monday to Saturday. Advance booking strongly recommended. Please call (028) 90 234 888 to reserve your place. Please note that the Tasting Menu is not available in December. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

vouchers.name: The Merchant Overnight Experience for Two
vouchers.description:
Enjoy a luxurious overnight stay at The Merchant Hotel in a stunning Art Deco or Victorian Deluxe Room. Whether you're in need of a midweek treat or a weekend celebration, this voucher is valid for use any night of the week.

After checking in, why not begin your relaxing stay with a dip in our roof top hot tub which boasts uninterrupted views across the city, or have a cocktail in our award-winning Cocktail Bar? Following a blissful night’s sleep, enjoy breakfast in the grandeur of The Great Room Restaurant and take advantage of our complimentary digital newspapers, movies and WIFI during your stay with a leisurely checkout of 1pm. This also includes complimentary self parking, with your ticket validated at reception.

T&Cs: Must be booked three weeks prior to arrival date and must be booked directly at the hotel by calling (028) 90 234 888. Based on two persons sharing. Must present voucher on arrival. No cancellations once booking is made. Flexible booking - includes one date change with 7 days’ notice. Guest may choose Victorian or Art Deco Deluxe Room, subject to availability. This voucher cannot be exchanged for cash. 

Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

vouchers.name: The Elemis Indulgence Ritual
vouchers.description:
Melt away stress with a full body massage at The Merchant Spa using one of the Elemis Elixirs. This is followed by a Superfood Radiance Facial to give your skin a nutritional boost rich in superfoods and essential minerals designed to revitalize dull, tired skin.

The 3 hour Elemis Indulgence Ritual includes:

  • 60 Minute Hydrotherapy Experience
  • 60 Minute Full Body Massage
  • 60 Minute Elemis Superfood Radiance Facial
  • Glass of bubbles in the Relaxation Room

Terms and conditions apply. Please note, this e-voucher cannot be redeemed throughout the month of December. Bookings are subject to availability. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.

vouchers.name: The VOYA Self Discovery Radience Facial
vouchers.description:
Allow VOYA to tailor your facial to your skin’s unique needs. Begin with a comprehensive skin analysis where your therapist will choose specific facial products to target your particular skin concerns. Using a combination of gentle exfoliators, serums and masks, this facial helps transform skin leaving it feeling purified, nourished and perfectly balanced. This is a 60-minute treatment.

Terms and conditions: Please note, this e-voucher cannot be redeemed throughout the month of December. Bookings are subject to availability. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

vouchers.name: Elemis Pro Collagen Facial
vouchers.description:
This popular facial tackles fine lines and wrinkles with the clinically proven age defying benefits of marine-charged Padina Pavonica and Red Coral. The targeted massage encourages optimum cellular function for nourished, younger looking skin. This is a 60-minute treatment.

Terms and conditions: Please note, this e-voucher cannot be redeemed throughout the month of December. Bookings are subject to availability. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

vouchers.name: Overnight Stay with Prosecco
vouchers.description:
Enjoy a luxurious overnight stay at The Merchant Hotel in a stunning Art Deco or Victorian Deluxe Room with a bottle of Prosecco to add a little extra sparkle to your visit.

After checking in, why not begin your relaxing stay with a trip to our rooftop sauna and steam room, or have a cocktail in our award-winning Cocktail Bar? Following a blissful night’s sleep, enjoy breakfast in the grandeur of The Great Room Restaurant and take advantage of our complimentary digital newspapers, movies and WIFI during your stay. 

T&Cs: Voucher valid from 01/01/21 for overnight stays Sunday to Thursday, excluding New Year's Eve. Bookings are subject to availability. Must be booked three weeks prior to arrival date and must be booked directly at the hotel by calling (028) 90 234 888. Based on two persons sharing. Must present voucher on arrival. No cancellations once booking is made. Flexible booking - includes one date change with 7 days’ notice. Guest may choose Victorian or Art Deco Deluxe Room, subject to availability. This voucher cannot be exchanged for cash. 

Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

vouchers.name: Berts Jazz Bar - Sublime Offer
vouchers.description:
Indulge yourself and a friend or loved one with three courses for two people and a selected bottle of wine.

Enjoy an evening of fine dining and jazz with Berts Jazz Bar's Sublime offer. Choose three courses from a selected range of our a la carte menu and complement them with a selected bottle of wine.

T&Cs apply: This Sublime offer is available from Sunday to Thursday 5pm to 10pm, excluding Bank Holidays. Please note, this offer is not available throughout December. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

vouchers.name: Champagne Afternoon Tea for Two
vouchers.description:
Enjoy The Merchant Hotel’s traditional Afternoon Tea in the elegance of The Great Room. Our three tiered silver stand boasts finger sandwiches, scones with clotted cream and jam and a delicious selection of cakes, pastries and sweet treats. This will be accompanied by your choice of Ruinart N.V. or Ruinart Rosé, plus tea or coffee. Advance booking strongly recommended. Please call (028) 90 234 888 to reserve your place. 

Terms and conditions: Please note, this e-voucher cannot be redeemed throughout the month of December. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

vouchers.name: Afternoon Tea for Two
vouchers.description:

Terms and conditions: Please note, this e-voucher cannot be redeemed throughout the month of December. Advance booking strongly recommended. Please call (028) 90 234 888 to reserve your place. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

Our three tiered silver stand boasts finger sandwiches, scones with clotted cream and jam and a delicious selection of cakes, pastries and sweet treats. This will be accompanied by one of our seasonal cocktails, plus tea or coffee.

Terms and conditions: Please note, this e-voucher cannot be redeemed throughout the month of December. Advance booking strongly recommended. Please call (028) 90 234 888 to reserve your place.  Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

This will be accompanied by one of our seasonal cocktails, plus tea or coffee.

Terms and conditions: Please note, this e-voucher cannot be redeemed throughout the month of December. Advance booking strongly recommended. Please call (028) 90 234 888 to reserve your place. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

vouchers.name: Tasting Menu for Two in The Great Room
vouchers.description:
A quintessential fine dining experience awaits guests visiting The Great Room Restaurant in the form of our delectable Tasting Menu. The grandeur of the perfectly preserved original Victorian architecture provides a stunning backdrop for the divine food created in The Great Room kitchens by Head Chef Johnny Leake. 


Terms and conditions: Please note, this e-voucher cannot be redeemed throughout the month of December.  Menu changes seasonally. Matched wines can be added for an additional £35 per person. Available Monday to Saturday. Advance booking strongly recommended. Please call (028) 90 234 888 to reserve your place. Please note that the 6 course tasting menu is not available in December. EXPIRY: Our monetary e-vouchers have no expiry date*. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase. Thereafter they will convert into their monetary equivalent and a supplement may apply to match the price of the experience at the time of redemption. *Please note after 7 years from date of purchase, due to financial handling procedures, all gift card information will be expunged, and the voucher will be invalidated.

vouchers.name: Charcuterie board, dessert and wine for two at Berts Jazz Bar
vouchers.description:
Transport yourself back to the chic, intimate jazz bars of 1930s New York and let the cool melodies wash over you with a night at Berts Jazz Bar. Enjoy a charcuterie board for for two, two desserts and a bottle of house wine - the perfect date night!

Terms and Conditions apply: Valid Monday to Thursday. Voucher not available 14th February or throughout the month of December. Bookings subject to availability. Voucher must be presented to a member of staff in advance.

EXPIRY: Please note, this e-voucher cannot be redeemed throughout the month of December.  Offer includes a bottle of Berts' house red or white wine. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

vouchers.name: Afternoon Tea for One
vouchers.description:
Enjoy The Merchant Hotel’s traditional Afternoon Tea in the elegance of The Great Room. Our three tiered silver stand boasts finger sandwiches, scones with clotted cream and jam and a delicious selection of cakes, pastries and sweet treats. Advance booking strongly recommended. Please call (028) 90 234 888 to reserve your place.

EXPIRY: Please note, this e-voucher cannot be redeemed throughout the month of December. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

vouchers.name: The Merchant Stress Relief Massage
vouchers.description:
This ultimate customised massage experience was designed for the sole purpose of stress relief. It is a medium pressure massage that focuses on main tension points: head, neck, shoulders, back and feet, using seaweed oil to nourish the skin. This massage will leave skin feeling soft and your body feeling totally relaxed. This is a 60-minute treatment.

Terms and conditions: Please note, this e-voucher cannot be redeemed throughout the month of December. Bookings are subject to availability. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

Enjoy The Merchant Hotel’s traditional Afternoon Tea in the elegance of The Great Room. Our three tiered silver stand boasts finger sandwiches, scones with clotted cream and jam and a delicious selection of cakes, pastries and sweet treats. This will be accompanied by your choice of Ruinart N.V. or Ruinart Rosé, plus tea or coffee.

Advance booking strongly recommended. Please call (028) 90 234 888 to reserve your place. Please note, this e-voucher cannot be redeemed throughout the month of December. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

vouchers.name: Vegan Afternoon Tea for One
vouchers.description:
Enjoy The Merchant Hotel’s Vegan Afternoon Tea in the elegance of The Great Room. Our three tiered silver stand boasts vegan finger sandwiches, scones with jam and a delicious selection of vegan cakes, pastries and sweet treats.

EXPIRY: Please note, this e-voucher cannot be redeemed throughout the month of December. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

vouchers.name: The VOYA Restorative Ritual
vouchers.description:
This 3 hour treatment starts with a back and leg massage to induce relaxation and gently melt away muscular tension. Then we re-charge circulation in your feet and refine your skin with a sea salt scrub exfoliation followed by your feet being wrapped in warm Atlantic seaweed leaves. This is then followed with a Self-Discovery Facial which is tailored to your individual skincare needs. Complete your experience with a glass of bubbles in our Relaxation Room.

The VOYA Restorative Ritual includes:

60 minute Hydrotherapy Experience
30 minute Back of Body Massage
30 minute Foot Treatment

vouchers.name: Perfect Midweek Package for 2 (Dine in The Great Room Restaurant)
vouchers.description:
Enjoy a luxurious stay at The Merchant Hotel with dinner in The Great Room Restaurant and breakfast the following morning. Begin your relaxation in our roof top hot tub which boasts uninterrupted views of the city. Continue your journey in the evening with an exquisite meal in the stunning surrounds of the award-winning Great Room Restaurant.

Following a blissful night’s sleep, enjoy breakfast The Great Room and take advantage of our complimentary digital newspapers, movies & Wi-Fi during your stay with a leisurely checkout at noon.

This package is available from Sunday to Thursday.

T&Cs: Must be booked three weeks prior to arrival date and must be booked directly at the hotel by calling (028) 90 234 888. Based on two persons sharing. Must present voucher on arrival. No cancellations once booking is made. Voucher cannot be used for a stay throughout December. Flexible booking - includes one date change with 7 days’ notice. This package includes a stay in either a Deluxe Victorian or Deluxe Art Deco bedroom. This voucher cannot be exchanged for cash. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.* Terms and conditions apply.

vouchers.name: Voya Pre Natal Voyager
vouchers.description:
The VOYA Pre Natal Voyager is a relaxing, organic, wellbeing ritual promoting relaxation and a sense of tranquillity while deeply hydrating and nourishing your skin. Nourishing Mama Oil is used to gently ease stress and tension with a top–to -toe body, face and scalp massage. Melt away the aches and pains of pregnancy and feel comfortably cocooned, supported and restored. Treatment time - 60 minutes. 

Terms and conditions apply. Please note, this e-voucher cannot be redeemed throughout the month of December. Bookings are subject to availability. Our e-voucher 'experiences' are valid for 12 months from date of purchase.
